about_the_game:
This token pack contains 29 tokens you can use to represent various player characters or other NPCs

This token pack includes:

  • Human Female Bard
  • Human Female Cleric
  • Human Female Druid
  • Human Female Dual Wielder
  • Human Male Alchemist
  • Human Male Druid
  • Human Male Fighter
  • Human Male Heavy Knight
  • Human Male Inquisitor
  • Human Male Magus
  • Human Male Tux
  • Human Male Priest
  • Human Male Red Skull
  • 3 Human Male Royal Guard
  • Human Male Mounted Scout
  • Human Male Seer
  • Human Male Skirmisher
  • Human Male Sorcerer
  • 2 Human Male Swordsman
  • 2 Human Male Vampire Hunter
  • Human Male Wanderer
  • 3 Human Male Witch Hunter
  • Human Male Witch Hunter Prone

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
